Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Wabash
ShortDescription: 79 79th  buses temp. rerouted EB: 79th, State, 76th, King Dr, 79th; WB: 79th, King Dr., 76th, Lafayette, 79th: due to police activity near 79th/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to police activity near 79th/Wabash.

Eastbound buses will operate via 79th, State, 76th, King Drive then resume their route on 79th.

Westbound buses will operate via 79th, King Drive, 76th, Lafayette, then resume their route on 79th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed near Kimball
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Kimball due to signal problems.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Kimball due to signal problems. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
